input.sentences: before we left our room | i wanted to take a picture of my wife .
we left the room to go outside and view the pool .
after the pool | we left the resort to explore the lovely city .

the last thing we did was take pictures at the beach .
output.sentences: He loved the picture of his wife sitting on the bed in the hotel room and waving her left hand.
The husband found synchronicity in the pool also being to the left side as he viewed it.
Their resort had the pool and many other lovely amenities.
They were excited about the immaculate, outdoor venue where they had a concert scheduled.
The next day they went swimming in the ocean and took a lot of pictures of the beach.
